WRITING.TEXT: Also just continueing with the whole foreign workers part. The death count of the workers building the new stadiums is already over 1000.

WRITING.TITLE: The new streaming twitch and the relation to twitch
WRITING.TEXT: I really like the new youtube streaming channel but will games still be saved on twitch? I would like to see things like Eurotruck where there is copyrighted music saved to both Youtube and Twitch.On Twitch copyrighted music is much more lenient and then people on mobile can still watch non music edition on Youtube .
